title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: The display property of an item is not taking effect when set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item remains visible in the PDF preview.
EB: In the PDF preview, the item with the display property set to 'none' should be hidden.
SR: To reproduce:1. Open the PDF preview.2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.3. Verify if the item is still visible in the PDF preview.
